tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  feedback_text TEXT,
  satisfaction_rating INT,
  feedback_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback ( feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, customer_id UUID NOT NULL, feedback_date DATE NOT NULL, feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE feedback_ratings ( rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, feedback_id UUID NOT NULL, rating_value INT NOT NULL, rating_date DATE NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE customer_details ( customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, customer_name TEXT NOT NULL, email TEXT NOT NULL, phone_number TEXT )
CREATE TABLE feedback_tags ( tag_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, feedback_id UUID NOT NULL, tag_name TEXT NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone_number VARCHAR(15));
CREATE TABLE feedback_data (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, feedback_date DATE, feedback_text TEXT);
CREATE TABLE ratings (rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY, feedback_id INT, rating_score INT);
CREATE TABLE feedback_category (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE feedback_mapping (feedback_id INT, category_id INT);
